channel.title: I cant broadcast my server and cant log in
channel.description:
ok please i really need help here.... it wont let anyone on my server even though it used to before... im not sure why but it just did.
#2 i compile and get the "ok message" then run it then get the "Starting CocoaScape on yada yada yada. then i go to log in on the same computer and get this message [code]ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1603 Exception in thread "thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 800 at Player.<init><Player.java:47> at client.<init><client.java:8803> at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient<PlayerHandler.java:44> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown Source>[/code]
I get that message when trying to log in. I only get it the first time and after it it just like ignores every other attempt to log in....
please i really actually need help with this b/c i am very stuck
help is really appreciated Thank You

item.title: I cant broadcast my server and cant log in
item.dc:creator: @cocoa7 cocoa7
item.description:
@cocoa7 wrote:

[code] for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
if (i == 3) {
playerLevel[i] = 99;
playerXP[i] = 14000000;
} else {
playerLevel[i] = 1;
playerXP[i] = 0;
}
}

	for (int i = 0; i< playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank items
		bankItems[i] = 0;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank item amounts
		bankItemsN[i] = 0;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
		playerEquipment[i] = -1;
		playerEquipmentN[i] = 0;
	}[/code]

thats lines 29-57

nething seem wrong???[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 02:20:18 PM[/size][hr]c mon please guys nething i need help here

its like me with or without a server with this question…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 02:32:35 PM[/size][hr]anyone?
